sqlMap.sql: select MAIN_ACCT_ID , LOGIN_NAME , USER_NAME , VALID , LOCK_STATUS , ACCT_TYPE , ROLELIST , EFFECT_TIME , EXPIRE_TIME , CREATE_TIME , AREA_ID , ORG_ID , ORGNAME , UPDATE_TIME , SUPERUSER , OPENDAYS , LOGONDAYS , MODIFY_MODE , ACCT_USAGE
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT uap_seq.NEXTVAL AS id FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO A4_MAIN_ACCT_SNAP ( MAIN_ACCT_ID , LOGIN_NAME , USER_NAME , VALID , LOCK_STATUS , ACCT_TYPE , ROLELIST , EFFECT_TIME , EXPIRE_TIME , CREATE_TIME , AREA_ID , ORG_ID , ORGNAME , UPDATE_TIME , SUPERUSER , OPENDAYS , LOGONDAYS , MODIFY_MODE , ACCT_USAGE ) VALUES ( #mainAcctId# , #loginName# , #userName# , #valid# , #lockStatus# , #acctType# , #rolelist# , #effectTime# , #expireTime# , #createTime# , #areaId# , #orgId# , #orgname# , #updateTime# , #superuser# , #opendays# , #logondays# , #modifyMode# , #acctUsage# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE A4_MAIN_ACCT_SNAP SET MAIN_ACCT_ID = #mainAcctId# , LOGIN_NAME = #loginName# , USER_NAME = #userName# , VALID = #valid# , LOCK_STATUS = #lockStatus# , ACCT_TYPE = #acctType# , ROLELIST = #rolelist# , EFFECT_TIME = #effectTime# , EXPIRE_TIME = #expireTime# , CREATE_TIME = #createTime# , AREA_ID = #areaId# , ORG_ID = #orgId# , ORGNAME = #orgname# , UPDATE_TIME = #updateTime# , SUPERUSER = #superuser# , OPENDAYS = #opendays# , LOGONDAYS = #logondays# , MODIFY_MODE = #modifyMode# , ACCT_USAGE = #acctUsage# WHERE MAIN_ACCT_ID = #mainAcctId#

UPDATE A4_MAIN_ACCT_SNAP SET MAIN_ACCT_ID = #mainAcctId# , LOGIN_NAME = #loginName# , USER_NAME = #userName# , VALID = #valid# , LOCK_STATUS = #lockStatus# , ACCT_TYPE = #acctType# , ROLELIST = #rolelist# , EFFECT_TIME = #effectTime# , EXPIRE_TIME = #expireTime# , CREATE_TIME = #createTime# , AREA_ID = #areaId# , ORG_ID = #orgId# , ORGNAME = #orgname# , UPDATE_TIME = #updateTime# , SUPERUSER = #superuser# , OPENDAYS = #opendays# , LOGONDAYS = #logondays# , MODIFY_MODE = #modifyMode# , ACCT_USAGE = #acctUsage# WHERE LOGIN_NAME = #loginName#
sqlMap.select: SELECT T.MAIN_ACCT_ID, T.LOGIN_NAME, T.ACCT_TYPE, T.VALID, T.MODIFY_MODE FROM A4_MAIN_ACCT_SNAP T INTERSECT SELECT W.MAIN_ACCT_ID, W.LOGIN_NAME, W.ACCT_TYPE, W.VALID, W.MODIFY_MODE FROM A4_MAIN_ACCT_USABLEDAY_USAGE W

SELECT T.MAIN_ACCT_ID, T.LOGIN_NAME, T.ACCT_TYPE, T.VALID, T.MODIFY_MODE FROM A4_MAIN_ACCT_SNAP T where t.last_update_time>SYSDATE -10 MINUS SELECT W.MAIN_ACCT_ID, W.LOGIN_NAME, W.ACCT_TYPE, W.VALID, W.MODIFY_MODE FROM A4_MAIN_ACCT_USABLEDAY_USAGE W
sqlMap.insert: insert into a4_main_acct_snap (select main_acct_id, case when length(t.login_name) > 32 then substr(t.login_name, 0, 32) else t.login_name end login_name, login_pwd, pwd_question, pwd_answer, authen_rule_id, case when (sysdate >= t.effect_time and sysdate < t.expire_time and t.lock_status='0' ) then '0' else '1' end lock_status, lock_type, lock_desc, lock_main_acct_id, lock_time, pwd_type, pwd_wrong_times, pwd_update_time, effect_time, expire_time, last_login_time, create_time, last_update_time, work_no, area_id, pwd_rule_id, name, gender, birth_date, id_card_no, education, mobile, email, oa_email, tel, staff_no, person_status, staff_type, remark, join_date, contract_expire_date, default_org, acct_type, acct_position, CANLOGINWAY, IS_APPROVE, case when (sysdate >= t.effect_time and sysdate < t.expire_time and t.lock_status = '0') then '1' else '0' end valid, case when (to_char(t.last_update_time,'yyyy-mm-dd')<>to_char(t.create_time,'yyyy-mm-dd')) then 'upd' else 'add' end modify_mode from uap_main_acct t where t.create_time < to_date(#createTime#, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:Mi:ss') union all (select main_acct_id, case when length(t1.login_name) > 32 then substr(t1.login_name, 0, 32) else t1.login_name end login_name, login_pwd, pwd_question, pwd_answer, authen_rule_id, case when (sysdate >= t1.effect_time and sysdate < t1.expire_time and t1.lock_status='0' ) then '0' else '1' end lock_status, lock_type, lock_desc, lock_main_acct_id, lock_time, pwd_type, pwd_wrong_times, pwd_update_time, effect_time, expire_time, last_login_time, create_time, last_update_time, work_no, area_id, pwd_rule_id, name, gender, birth_date, id_card_no, education, mobile, email, oa_email, tel, staff_no, person_status, staff_type, remark, join_date, contract_expire_date, default_org, acct_type, acct_position, '', IS_APPROVE, case when (sysdate >= t1.effect_time and sysdate < t1.expire_time and t1.lock_status = '0') then '1' else '0' end valid, 'del' modify_mode from (select * from a4_main_acct_his_today where login_name not in (select login_name from uap_main_acct) minus select * from a4_main_acct_his_yestoday ) t1))
sqlMap.select: select t.MAIN_ACCT_ID, t.LOGIN_NAME, t.USER_NAME, t.VALID, t.LOCK_STATUS, t.ACCT_TYPE, t.ROLELIST, t.EFFECT_TIME, t.EXPIRE_TIME, t.CREATE_TIME, t.AREA_ID, t.ORG_ID, t.ORGNAME, t.UPDATE_TIME, t.SUPERUSER, t.OPENDAYS, t.logondays, t.MODIFY_MODE, t.ACCT_USAGE from a4_main_acct_snap t where (t.create_time >= to_date(#beginTime#, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') and t.create_time < to_date(#endTime#, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')) or (t.update_time >= to_date(#beginTime#, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') and t.UPDATE_TIME < to_date(#endTime#, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')) or (t.update_time >= to_date(#beginTime#, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') and t.UPDATE_TIME < to_date(#endTime#, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') and t.modify_mode = 'del')

select t.MAIN_ACCT_ID, t.LOGIN_NAME, t.USER_NAME, t.VALID, t.LOCK_STATUS, t.ACCT_TYPE, t.ROLELIST, t.EFFECT_TIME, t.EXPIRE_TIME, t.CREATE_TIME, t.AREA_ID, t.ORG_ID, t.ORGNAME, t.UPDATE_TIME, t.SUPERUSER, t.OPENDAYS, t.logondays, t.MODIFY_MODE, t.ACCT_USAGE from a4_main_acct_snap t where t.LOGIN_NAME = #login_name#
